head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KAUFMAN, BURRELL A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KAUFMAN, BURRELL A.

block.p: KAUFMAN-Burrell A. Metal Trader. On July 5, 2000 at age 61 in Tucson, AZ formerly of South Orange, New Jersey. A true, honorable, gentle man, loving husband, and adored father. Survivors include wife Frances, daughters Amy, Sara, and Julie, sisters Lynda Israel and Deborah Kaufman (Idrees Malik), sisters-in-law Sybil Kaufman, & Bette (Stuart) Lehman, nephews, nieces, & grand nieces & nephews. Donations may be made to: Damon Runyon Cancer Fund, 675 3 Ave. NY, NY 10017
